item.title: Biden insists he is staying in the presidential race, ahead of pivotal ABC News interview
item.description: President Joe Biden is scheduled to speak with ABC News anchor George Stephanopoulos during a campaign trip to Madison, Wisconsin.

item.title: Keir Starmer becomes U.K. prime minister after his Labour Party wins huge majority in general election - CBS News
item.description:
1. Keir Starmer becomes U.K. prime minister after his Labour Party wins huge majority in general election  CBS News
  2. Opinion | In the U.K. Election, Keir Starmer — the Boring Choice — Wins  The New York Times
  3. New U.K. Prime Minister Keir Starmer met the king, gave a speech, got to work  The Washington Post
  4. Starmer pledges to ‘reset’ Britain as Labour takes over after 14 years of Conservative rule  CNN
  5. Britain's Labour pulled off a thumping election victory with just 34% of the national vote  CNBC

item.title: Intra-Maga row for Missouri’s attorney general seat reveals exaggerated résumé
item.description:
Trump lawyer Will Scarf’s claims of prosecuting violent criminals conflicts with his record of mundane actions

A lawyer on the legal team that argued in favor of a US supreme court ruling granting Donald Trump broad criminal immunity has inflated his credentials as a violent crime prosecutor in a political beauty contest aimed at wooing the former president’s Maga supporters and becoming Missouri’s attorney general.

Will Scharf, who sat on the former’s president’s appellate team fighting charges of subversion brought by the special prosecutor Jack Smith, has burnished his crime-fighting credentials on his campaign literature as he seeks to unseat Missouri’s sitting attorney general, Andrew Bailey, in a GOP primary next month.

Continue reading...
